<script>
 window.Krux || ((Krux = function() {
   Krux.q.push(arguments);
 }).q = []);
 (function() {
   function retrieve(n) {
     var m, k = 'kx' + n;
     if (window.localStorage) {
       return window.localStorage[k] || "";
     } else if (navigator.cookieEnabled) {
       m = document.cookie.match(k + '=([^;]*)');
       return (m && unescape(m[1])) || "";
     } else {
       return '';
     }
   }
   Krux.user = retrieve('user');
   Krux.segments = retrieve('segs') && retrieve('segs').split(',') || [];
 })();
</script>

	//# sourceMappingURL=https://s3.amazonaws.com/d3jlsadfjkuern/1.7.310/Ym9vdHN0cmFwLmpz.map</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

	/*
	 * Setup googletag for GPT loading
	 */
	function _resetGPT(isAdblocker) {

		/*
		 *  Setup command queue w/ adslots and enable.  Note the different adslots for w/ adblocker and w/o
		 */
		if (isAdblocker) {

			if ( googletag && googletag.cmd ) {
				googletag.cmd.push( function() { googletag.destroySlots();});
			}

			window.googletag = {};
			window.googletag.cmd = [];

			if ( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc && 'undefined' !== typeof pmc.hooks ) {

				pmc.hooks.add_filter( 'pmc_adm_gpt_slot', function( slot ) {
					if ( 'string' === typeof slot ) {
						var slot_components = slot.split('/');
						var components = [];
						for (var i = 0; i < slot_components.length; i++) {
							if (slot_components[i] !== 'undefined' && slot_components[i] !== null && slot_components[i] !== "") {
								components.push(slot_components[i]);
							}
						}
						slot_component = components[2];
						if(slot_component.indexOf('source-') === -1 ){
							slot = slot.replace( '/'+slot_component, '/source-'+slot_component );
						}
					}
					return slot;
				} );
			}

			if( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_adm_gpt && 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_adm_gpt.settings) {
				var ad_list =  pmc_adm_gpt.settings.ad_list;
				// Empty the adlist and keep only the default ad-group for recovery. Do not pass interstitial and prestitial for recovery with sp
				pmc_adm_gpt.settings.ad_list = {};
				for ( var t in ad_list ) {
					if( 'default' === t ) {
						pmc_adm_gpt.settings.ad_list['default'] = ad_list['default'];
						break;
					}
				}
				pmc_adm_gpt.init( pmc_adm_gpt.settings );
			}

			if( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_admanager ) {
				pmc_admanager.hide_interrupt();
			}

			if( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_dfp_prestitial) {
				pmc_dfp_prestitial.properties.isAdSkippedManually = true;
				pmc_dfp_prestitial.destroy();
			}

		}
	}

	/*
	 * Prepare the googletag object and fill the cmd queue
	 */
	_resetGPT(false);

	var gptLoadComplete = false;
	var isBlocking = false;
	var spccDisable = false;

	/*
	 *  Reset and load GPT via Sourcepoint proxy if initial GPT load complete and adblocker detected
	 */
	function _resetAndLoadGPTRecovery() {
		if (gptLoadComplete && isBlocking) {
			_resetGPT(true);
			window._sp_.dfp.loadGPT();
		}
	}

	/*
	 *  Add callbacks to set our 'gptLoadComplete' flag and optionally load recovery
	 */
	window._sp_gpt_callback = function() {
		gptLoadComplete = true;
		_resetAndLoadGPTRecovery();
	};

	/*
	 * Configure Sourcepoint
	 */

	window._sp_ = window._sp_ || {};
	window._sp_.config = window._sp_.config || {};
	window._sp_.config.account_id = 239;
	window._sp_.config.publisher_base = "//sp.deadline.com/abc";
	window._sp_.config.gpt_auto_load = false;
	window._sp_.config.enable_rid = true;
	window._sp_.config.enable_vid = true;
	window._sp_.config.enable_blocker_style_sheet_disabling = false;

	if( 'undefined' !== typeof window.pmc_cookies && 'undefined' !== window.pmc_cookies._pmc_spcc && '1' === window.pmc_cookies._pmc_spcc ) {
		spccDisable = true;
	}
	
	/*
	 *  setup listener for adblocker detected. Set flag and optionally load recovery
	 */
	document.addEventListener('sp.blocking', function (e) {
		var admzs = document.getElementsByClassName('admz');
		for (var i = 0; i < admzs.length; i++) {
			admzs[i].className = 'admz-sp';
		}
		isBlocking = true;
		_resetAndLoadGPTRecovery();
	});

	/*
	 * Load sp through bootstrap
	 */
	window.spBootstrap("https://sp3.deadline.com/dl/delivery-new.js");

</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		/* <![CDATA[ */
		function addLoadEvent(func) {
			var oldonload = window.onload;
			if (typeof window.onload != 'function') {
				window.onload = func;
			} else {
				window.onload = function () {
					oldonload();
					func();
				}
			}
		}
		/* ]]> */
	</script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
			window._wpemojiSettings = {"baseUrl":"https:\/\/s0.wp.com\/wp-content\/mu-plugins\/wpcom-smileys\/twemoji\/2\/72x72\/","ext":".png","svgUrl":"https:\/\/s0.wp.com\/wp-content\/mu-plugins\/wpcom-smileys\/twemoji\/2\/svg\/","svgExt":".svg","source":{"concatemoji":"https:\/\/cfstatic.deadline.com\/wp-includes\/js\/wp-emoji-release.min.js?m=1473172720h&ver=4.6.1-RC1-38499"}};
			!function(a,b,c){function d(a){var c,d,e,f,g,h=b.createElement("canvas"),i=h.getContext&&h.getContext("2d"),j=String.fromCharCode;if(!i||!i.fillText)return!1;switch(i.textBaseline="top",i.font="600 			})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

			var pmc_ga_dimensions = {"dimension1":"article","dimension3":"1201912990","dimension4":"abusch","dimension5":"books|breaking-news|nfl|screenwriting|sports","dimension6":"casey-sherman|dave-wedge|eric-johnson|new-england-patriots|nfl|paul-tamasy|tom-brady","dimension7":"film","dimension8":"books","dimension9":"film","dimension10":"2017","dimension11":"02","dimension12":"15","dimension13":"14","dimension14":"56","dimension25":"2017-02-15T22:56:19+00:00","dimension26":"2017-02-15 14:56:19","dimension27":"Wednesday","dimension29":"anonymous"};			pmc_ga_dimensions["dimension15"] = document.location.protocol.replace(':', '');
			(function(dim){
				var ac = document.cookie ? document.cookie.split('; ') : [];
				var i, parts, name, c, cookies = {}, rdecode = /(%[0-9A-Z]{2})+/g, rspace = /\+/g;
				for(i = 0; i < ac.length; i++) {
					parts = ac[i].split('=');
					name = parts[0].replace(rdecode, decodeURIComponent);
					c = parts.slice(1).join('=');
					if(c.charAt(0) === '"') { c = c.slice(1, -1); }
					c = c.replace(rdecode, decodeURIComponent).replace(rspace, ' ');
					cookies[name] = c;
				}
				window[dim] = window[dim] || {};
							if( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_meta && 'string' === typeof pmc_meta.omni_visit_id ){
				window[dim]["dimension28"] = pmc_meta.omni_visit_id;
			}
					})('pmc_ga_dimensions');
			ga('create', 'UA-1915907-29', 'auto');
			ga('set', 'forceSSL', true);

<!-- Swiftype Meta Tags Start -->
<meta class="swiftype" name="title" data-type="string" content="Tom Brady Book &amp; Movie Coming From &#039;The Finest Hours&#039; Writing Team" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="author" data-type="string" content="Anita Busch" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="published_at" data-type="date" content="2017-02-15 14:56:19" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="image" data-type="enum" content="https://cfmedia.deadline.com/2045/06/tom-brady-super-bowl.jpg?w=300" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="comment_count" data-type="integer" content="21" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="tags" data-type="string" content="Casey Sherman" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="tags" data-type="string" content="Dave Wedge" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="tags" data-type="string" content="Eric Johnson" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="tags" data-type="string" content="New England Patriots" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="tags" data-type="string" content="NFL" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="tags" data-type="string" content="Paul Tamasy" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="tags" data-type="string" content="Tom Brady" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="topics" data-type="string" content="Film" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="body" data-type="text" content="EXCLUSIVE: A new book and feature film project about Tom Brady, who has won more Super Bowls than any quarterback in NFL history, is on its way. Paul Tamasy and Eric Johnson, the writers behind Disney&#039;s The Finest Hours who were nominated for an Oscar for The Fighter, and New York Times bestselling author Casey Sherman are reteaming.

Joining up with them is Boston journalist Dave Wedge, who was Sherman&#039;s co-author on Boston Strong. Tamasy and Johnson used the book as part of their source material the basis for Patriots Day, which they got story by credit on and also executive produced.



The Brady book and film will chronicle the New England Patriots superstar&#039;s come-from-behind win in Super Bowl LI, but it&#039;s not going to shy away from controversy and will include the team&#039;s battle to overcome the Deflategate debacle in 2014, follow Brady’s fall from grace and then his triumphant return to lead the Patriots to his fifth world championship. That surprising overtime victory against the Falcons this month cemented Brady’s and Bill Belichick’s legacies as the top quarterback and head coach in NFL history.

The writers already have cultivated several sources inside the Patriots locker room to provide a first-hand look at what went on behind the scenes in a Super Bowl that had everyone on the edge of their seats. The game, which the Patriots won 34-28, drew comparisons to other iconic moments in sports history such as Muhammad Ali&#039;s win over George Foreman in the 1974 &quot;Rumble in the Jungle.&quot;

Tamasy and Johnson also recently penned the screenplay about 5,000-to-1 underdog Leicester City’s miraculous run to the English Premier League title. We&#039;re told that Sherman and Wedge (who both work in Boston) had a front-row seat and watched the drama unfold.

Sherman&#039;s book The Finest Hours, which Tamasy and Johnson adapted, was made into a film last year that starred Chris Pine and Casey Affleck, the latter a Best Actor Oscar nominee for Manchester By The Sea.

The writers are repped by WME and The Gotham Group." />
<!-- Swiftype Meta Tags End -->

</script>

	<div id="fb-root"></div>
	<script>(function (d, s, id) {
			var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
			if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
			js = d.createElement(s);
			js.id = id;
			js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#xfbml=1&appId=290526267722658";
			fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
		}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));</script>

	<!-- Google Tag Manager -->
	<noscript><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-T247L5"
					  height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>
		<script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
		new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
		j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
		'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
	})(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-T247L5');</script>
	<!-- End Google Tag Manager -->

	<script async="1">
	(function() {
		__mtm = [ "578d001caa04d0826f287016", "cdn01.mzbcdn.net/mngr" ];
		var s = document.createElement('script');
		s.async = 1;
		s.src = '//' + __mtm[1] + '/mtm.js';
		var e = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
		(e.parentNode || document.body).insertBefore(s, e);
	})();
</script><!-- Placeholder for Responsive Skin Ad -->
<div id="skin-ad-section">

	<div id="skin-ad-left-rail-container"></div>

	<div id="skin-ad-right-rail-container"></div>
	<div id="skin-ad-inject-container">
		<div class="admz" id="adm-responsive-skin-ad">
	
		<div class="adma google-publisher" data-device="Desktop"
			 data-width="1">
			
<div class="pmc-adm-goog-pub-div ">
	<div id="gpt-dl-ros-skin-uid0" class="ad-rotatable adw-1 adh-1"></div>
	</div>
		</div>

	</div>
	</div>
</div>

<!-- End Placeholder for Responsive Skin Ad --><div id="fb-root"></div>

		<div id="content">
		
<div class="section-tag"><a href="http://deadline.com/v/film/" title="Go to all posts in Film" class="category">Film</a></div>

	<h1 class="post-title entry-title desktop">Tom Brady Book &amp; Movie Coming From &#8216;The Finest Hours&#8217; Writing&nbsp;Team</h1>

	
<div class="post-author-time">

    <div class="gravatars"><img width="56" height="76" src="https://cfmedia.deadline.com/2014/06/abusch.png?w=56&amp;h=76&amp;crop=1" class="attachment-author-gravatar size-author-gravatar wp-post-image" alt="abusch" /></div>
    <div class="author-info ">

        <span class="byline">by <a href="http://deadline.com/author/abusch/" title="Posts by Anita Busch" rel="author" class="name">Anita Busch</a>
		
		<div class="clear"></div></span>

        <time class="date-published updated">February 15, 2017 2:56pm</time>

        <div class="clear"></div>

        
<div class="counters">
	<ul class="share-comment">
		<li class="social-v3-facebook byline-icon fb-share-button as-popup">
			<a class="" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=http%3A%2F%2Fdeadline.com%2F2017%2F02%2Ftom-brady-new-england-patriots-book-movie-the-finest-hours-writing-creative-team-1201912990%2F&#038;t=Tom+Brady+Book+%26amp%3B+Movie+Coming+From+%E2%80%98The+Finest+Hours%E2%80%99+Writing%C2%A0Team" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"  ></a>
		</li>

		<li class="social-v3-twitter byline-icon as-popup" data-permalink="http://deadline.com/2017/02/tom-brady-new-england-patriots-book-movie-the-finest-hours-writing-creative-team-1201912990/" data-http-permalink="http://deadline.com/2017/02/tom-brady-new-england-patriots-book-movie-the-finest-hours-writing-creative-team-1201912990/">

<!--			<g:plusone size="medium" href="--><!--" data-width="60"></g:plusone>-->
		</li>
		<li class="social-v3-linkedin byline-icon as-popup">
			<a target="_blank" href="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=truemini=true&#038;url=http%3A%2F%2Fdeadline.com%2F2017%2F02%2Ftom-brady-new-england-patriots-book-movie-the-finest-hours-writing-creative-team-1201912990%2F&#038;title=Tom+Brady+Book+%26amp%3B+Movie+Coming+From+%E2%80%98The+Finest+Hours%E2%80%99+Writing%C2%A0Team&#038;summary=EXCLUSIVE%3A+A+new+book+and+feature+film+project+about+Tom+Brady%2C+who+has+won+more+Super+Bowls+than+any+quarterback+in+NFL+history%2C+is+on+its+way.+Paul+Tamasy+and+Eric+Johnson%2C+the+writers+behind+Disney%27s+The+Finest+Hours%C2%A0who+were+nominated+for+an+Oscar+for+The+Fighter%2C%C2%A0and+New+York+Times+bestselling+author+Casey+Sherman+are+reteaming.Joining+up&#038;source=Deadline" rel="nofollow" ></a>
		</li>
				<li class="social-v3-comments no-sprite">
			<i class="fa fa-comments ">
				<a class="" href="http://deadline.com/2017/02/tom-brady-new-england-patriots-book-movie-the-finest-hours-writing-creative-team-1201912990/#comments" title="Tom Brady Book &amp; Movie Coming From &#8216;The Finest Hours&#8217; Writing&nbsp;Team" >

<div id="content-wrapper">

	<article class="post-1201912990 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-books category-breaking-news category-nfl category-screenwriting category-sports tag-casey-sherman tag-dave-wedge tag-eric-johnson tag-new-england-patriots tag-nfl tag-paul-tamasy tag-tom-brady vertical-film">

					<div class="main-article-thumbnail-wrapper desktop ">
				<img width="446" height="299" src="https://cfmedia.deadline.com/2045/06/tom-brady-super-bowl.jpg?w=446&amp;h=299&amp;crop=1" class="attachment-main-article-thumb size-main-article-thumb wp-post-image" alt="Tom Brady movie" />			</div>
					<div class="tags thumb">
				<ul>
				<li>
				<a href="http://deadline.com/v/film/">
					Film				</a>
			</li>
					<li>
				<a href="http://deadline.com/category/books/">
					Books				</a>
			</li>
					<li>
				<a href="http://deadline.com/category/breaking-news/">
					Breaking News				</a>
			</li>
					<li>
				<a href="http://deadline.com/category/nfl/">
					NFL				</a>
			</li>
					<li>
				<a href="http://deadline.com/category/screenwriting/">
					Screenwriting				</a>
			</li>
					<li>
				<a href="http://deadline.com/category/sports/">
					Sports				</a>
			</li>
					<li>
				<a href="http://deadline.com/tag/casey-sherman/">
					Casey Sherman				</a>
			</li>
		</ul>			</div>

		<div class="copyright" itemprop="copyrightHolder">Associated Press</div><div class="clear"></div>
		<div id="main-content-wrapper" class="desktop ">

			<div class="post-content">
				<p><strong>EXCLUSIVE:</strong> A new book and feature film project about <a href="http://deadline.com/tag/tom-brady/" id="auto-tag_tom-brady" data-tag="tom-brady">Tom Brady</a>, who has won more Super Bowls than any quarterback in <a href="http://deadline.com/tag/nfl/" id="auto-tag_nfl" data-tag="nfl">NFL</a> history, is on its way. <a href="http://deadline.com/tag/paul-tamasy/" id="auto-tag_paul-tamasy" data-tag="paul-tamasy">Paul Tamasy</a> and <a href="http://deadline.com/tag/eric-johnson/" id="auto-tag_eric-johnson" data-tag="eric-johnson">Eric Johnson</a>, the writers behind Disney&#8217;s <em>The Finest Hours</em>&nbsp;who were nominated for an Oscar for <em>The Fighter,&nbsp;</em>and <em>New York Times</em> bestselling author <a href="http://deadline.com/tag/casey-sherman/" id="auto-tag_casey-sherman" data-tag="casey-sherman">Casey Sherman</a> are reteaming.</p>
<p><div class="related-article">
					<div class="pad">
						<a href="http://deadline.com/2017/02/directors-guild-rooney-rule-regected-diversity-push-dga-1201910795/" title="Related Article" class="related" >Related</a>
						<div class="article"><a href="http://deadline.com/2017/02/directors-guild-rooney-rule-regected-diversity-push-dga-1201910795/" title="Related Article" >Studios &amp; Networks Rebuff DGA Diversity Push For &quot;Rooney Rule&quot;</a></div>
						<div class="clear"></div>
					</div>
				</div></p>
<p>Joining up with them is Boston journalist <a href="http://deadline.com/tag/dave-wedge/" id="auto-tag_dave-wedge" data-tag="dave-wedge">Dave Wedge</a>, who was Sherman&#8217;s co-author on <em>Boston Strong. </em>Tamasy and Johnson used the book as part of their source material the basis for <em>Patriots Day</em>, which they got story by credit on and also executive produced.</p>
<p><a  href="https://cfmedia.deadline.com/2045/06/tom-brady-super-bowl-trophy.jpg"  target="_blank"  ><img class="alignright wp-image-1201913003" src="https://cfmedia.deadline.com/2045/06/tom-brady-super-bowl-trophy.jpg?w=441&#038;h=311" alt="Tom Brady movie" width="441" height="311" srcset="https://cfmedia.deadline.com/2045/06/tom-brady-super-bowl-trophy.jpg?w=441&amp;h=311 441w, https://cfmedia.deadline.com/2045/06/tom-brady-super-bowl-trophy.jpg?w=882&amp;h=622 882w, https://cfmedia.deadline.com/2045/06/tom-brady-super-bowl-trophy.jpg?w=150&amp;h=106 150w, https://cfmedia.deadline.com/2045/06/tom-brady-super-bowl-trophy.jpg?w=300&amp;h=212 300w, https://cfmedia.deadline.com/2045/06/tom-brady-super-bowl-trophy.jpg?w=768&amp;h=542 768w" sizes="(max-width: 441px) 100vw, 441px"></a></p>
<p>The Brady book and film will chronicle the <a href="http://deadline.com/tag/new-england-patriots/" id="auto-tag_new-england-patriots" data-tag="new-england-patriots">New England Patriots</a> superstar&#8217;s come-from-behind win in Super Bowl LI, but it&#8217;s not going to shy away from controversy and will include the team&#8217;s battle to overcome the Deflategate debacle in 2014, follow Brady&rsquo;s fall from grace and then his triumphant return to lead the Patriots to his fifth world championship. That surprising overtime victory against the Falcons&nbsp;this month cemented Brady&rsquo;s and Bill Belichick&rsquo;s legacies as the top quarterback and head coach in NFL history.</p>
<p>The writers already have cultivated several sources inside the Patriots locker room to provide a first-hand look at what went on behind the scenes in a Super Bowl that had everyone on the edge of their seats. The game, which the Patriots won 34-28, drew comparisons to other iconic moments in sports history such as Muhammad Ali&#8217;s win over George Foreman in the 1974 &#8220;Rumble in the Jungle.&#8221;</p>
<p>Tamasy and Johnson also recently penned <a  href="http://deadline.com/2016/07/leicester-city-movie-jamie-vardy-the-fighter-screenwriters-paul-tamasy-eric-johnson-1201793697/"  >the screenplay about 5,000-to-1 underdog Leicester City</a>&rsquo;s miraculous&nbsp;run to the English Premier League title. We&#8217;re told that Sherman and Wedge (who both work in Boston) had a front-row seat and watched the drama unfold.</p>
<p>Sherman&#8217;s book <em>The Finest Hours</em>, which Tamasy and Johnson adapted, was made into a film last year that starred Chris Pine and Casey Affleck, the latter a Best Actor Oscar nominee for <em>Manchester By The Sea</em>.</p>
<p>The writers are repped by WME and The Gotham Group.</p>
			</div>
					</div>

	</article>

	<!-- End of article link to Using text link widget -->
	<div id="text-4" class="widget-container widget_text">			<div class="textwidget"><p style="font-size:1.3335em;font-style:italic;margin-top:-10px;">Subscribe to <a href="http://pages.email.deadline.com/signup" style="color:#008ad8;">Deadline Breaking News Alerts</a> and keep your inbox happy</p></div>
		</div>

	</li>

	</li>

<script type="text/javascript">
var highlander_expando_javascript = function(){
	var input = document.createElement( 'input' ),
	    comment = jQuery( '#comment' );

	if ( 'placeholder' in input ) {
		comment.attr( 'placeholder', jQuery( '.comment-textarea label' ).remove().text() );
	}

	// Expando Mode: start small, then auto-resize on first click + text length
	jQuery( '#comment-form-identity' ).hide();
	jQuery( '#comment-form-subscribe' ).hide();
	jQuery( '#commentform .form-submit' ).hide();

	comment.css( { 'height':'10px' } ).one( 'focus', function() {
		var timer = setInterval( HighlanderComments.resizeCallback, 10 )
		jQuery( this ).animate( { 'height': HighlanderComments.initialHeight } ).delay( 100 ).queue( function(n) { clearInterval( timer ); HighlanderComments.resizeCallback(); n(); } );
		jQuery( '#comment-form-identity' ).slideDown();
		jQuery( '#comment-form-subscribe' ).slideDown();
		jQuery( '#commentform .form-submit' ).slideDown();
	});
}
jQuery(document).ready( highlander_expando_javascript );
</script>

<div id="comment-form-subscribe">
	<p class="comment-subscription-form"><input type="checkbox" name="subscribe" id="subscribe" value="subscribe" style="width: auto;"/> <label class="subscribe-label" id="subscribe-label" for="subscribe" style="display: inline;">Notify me of new comments via email.</label></p></div>

			</li><!-- #comment-## -->
</ul><!-- .children -->
</li><!-- #comment-## -->
			<li class="comment even thread-even depth-1 highlander-comment" id="li-comment-1806615">

					<div class="comment-body"><p>I&#8217;m in if the writers get into the locker room tension ramping up to the Presidential election and acrimony over the team White House visit.</p>
</div>

<!-- pmc-adm targeting -->
<script>
if ( typeof pmc !== 'undefined' && typeof pmc.hooks !== 'undefined' ) {
	pmc.hooks.add_filter( 'pmc-adm-set-targeting-keywords', function( keywords ) {
		try {
			if ( typeof Krux !== 'undefined' ) {
				if ( typeof keywords['ksg'] === 'undefined' ) {
					keywords['ksg']  = Krux.segments;
				}
				if ( typeof keywords['kuid'] === 'undefined' ) {
					keywords['kuid']  = Krux.user;
				}
			}
		} catch(e) {}
		return keywords;
	} );
}

(function() {
	if( window.hasOwnProperty('pmc_krux' ) ) {
		window.pmc_krux['destination-url'] = window.location.href;
		if( document.hasOwnProperty('referrer') && document.referrer.length ) {
			window.pmc_krux['referrer'] = document.referrer;
		}
		if( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_meta && 'string' === pmc_meta.omni_visit_id ) {
			window.pmc_krux['omni_visit_id'] = pmc_meta.omni_visit_id;
		}
	}
})();

</script>

<!-- DO NOT REMOVE, comment for engineering, 4BAfe4nkpyAktm3S -->
<!-- Begin comScore Tag -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	var _comscore = _comscore || []; _comscore.push({ c1: "2", c2: "6035310", c3: "", c4: "", c5: "", c6: "", c15: "" }); (function() { var s = document.createElement("script"), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; s.async = true; s.src = (document.location.protocol == "https:" ? "https://sb" : "http://b") + ".scorecardresearch.com/beacon.js"; el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el); })();
</script>
<!-- End comScore Tag -->

<!-- Quantcast Tag, part 2 -->
<script type="text/javascript">
_qevents.push([
	{ qacct:"p-0f0nSqEQ_DwA6" }, // Deadline P-code
	{ qacct:"p-31f3D02tYU8zY" } // PMC P-Code
]);
</script>
<noscript>
	<div style="display:none;">
		<img src="//pixel.quantserve.com/pixel?a.1=<code>&a.2=p-31f3D02tYU8zY" border="0" height="1" width="1" alt="Quantcast"/>
	</div>
</noscript>
<!-- Quantcast tag End, part 2 -->

<!-- CrazyEgg start -->
<script type="text/javascript">
setTimeout(function(){var a=document.createElement("script");
var b=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
a.src=document.location.protocol+"//dnn506yrbagrg.cloudfront.net/pages/scripts/0011/4414.js?"+Math.floor(new Date().getTime()/3600000);
a.async=true;a.type="text/javascript";b.parentNode.insertBefore(a,b)}, 1);
</script>
<!-- CrazyEgg end -->

<!-- START Nielsen Online SiteCensus V6.0 -->
<!-- COPYRIGHT 2010 Nielsen Online -->
<script type="text/javascript">
(function () {
var d = new Image(1, 1);
d.onerror = d.onload = function () { d.onerror = d.onload = null; };
d.src = ["//secure-us.imrworldwide.com/cgi-bin/m?ci=us-203220h&cg=0&cc=1&si=", escape(window.location.href), "&rp=", escape(document.referrer), "&ts=compact&rnd=", (new Date()).getTime()].join('');
})();
</script>
<noscript><div><img src="//secure-us.imrworldwide.com/cgi-bin/m?ci=us-203220h&cg=0&cc=1&ts=noscript" width="1" height="1" alt="" /></div></noscript>
<!-- END Nielsen Online SiteCensus V6.0 -->

<!-- START callback function for onhashchange(when the hash tag in the url gets updated) -->
<script type="text/javascript">
function global_urlhashchanged() {
		/**
	 * Track pageview
	 */
	// Build the current domain name
	var tmp_td = document.domain.split('.');
	var tracking_domain = tmp_td[tmp_td.length-2] + "." + tmp_td[tmp_td.length-1];

	// Build the current image
	var imgname = location.hash.replace('#','');
	try {
		ga( 'send', 'pageview', location.pathname + location.hash );
	} catch(err) {}



	// Track Comscore
	try {
		setTimeout(function(){ var url = "http" + (/^https:/.test(document.location.href) ? "s" : "") + "://beacon.scorecardresearch.com/scripts/beacon.dll" + "?c1=2&amp;c2=6035310&amp;c3=&amp;c4=&amp;c5=&amp;c6=&amp;c7=" + escape(document.location.href) + "&amp;c8=" + escape(document.title) + "&amp;c9=" + escape(document.referrer) + "&amp;c10=" + escape(screen.width+'x'+screen.height) + "&amp;rn=" + (new Date()).getTime(); var i = new Image(); i.src = url; }, 1);

		COMSCORE.beacon({ c1: "2", c2: "6035310", c3: "", c4: "", c5: "", c6: "", c15: ""});
	} catch(err) {}

	// Track Quantcast
	try {
		_qevents.push([
			{ qacct:"p-0f0nSqEQ_DwA6" }, // Deadline P-code
			{ qacct:"p-31f3D02tYU8zY" } // PMC P-Code
		]);
	} catch(err) {}

	/**
	 * Track pageview end
	 */
}
</script>

	wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.init();
	var mobileStatsQueryString = "";
	
	if( false !== wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.matchedPlatformName )
		mobileStatsQueryString += "&x_" + 'mobile_platforms' + '=' + wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.matchedPlatformName;
	
	if( false !== wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.matchedUserAgentName )
		mobileStatsQueryString += "&x_" + 'mobile_devices' + '=' + wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.matchedUserAgentName;
	
	if( wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.isIPad() )
		mobileStatsQueryString += "&x_" + 'ipad_views' + '=' + 'views';

		new Image().src = document.location.protocol + '//pixel.wp.com/g.gif?v=wpcom-no-pv' + mobileStatsQueryString + '&baba=' + Math.random();
